translations: n.头孢曲松钠（抗生素类药）

phrs.translation: 头孢曲松, 头孢三嗪, 头孢曲松钠, 菌必治
头孢曲松钠, 头孢三嗪, 头孢氨噻三嗪, 氨噻三嗪
注射用头孢曲松钠, 注射用头孢尼西钠, 凯赛欣, 凯塞欣
头孢曲松, 头孢三嗪

sentences.sentence: All H. influenzae strains were extremely susceptible to amoxicillin-clavulanic acid,cefuroxime, ceftriaxone.
sentences.translation: 对阿莫西林-克拉维酸、头孢曲松和头孢呋辛非常敏感。

sentences.sentence: Oral amoxicillin for 5 days was as effective as intramuscular ceftriaxone for 2 days (1 RCT).
sentences.translation: 口服阿莫西林5天的功效等同于肌肉注射头孢曲松2天(1个随机对照试验)。

sentences.sentence: The minimum inhibitory concentrations (MIC) of ceftriaxone were determined by AGAR dilution method.
sentences.translation: 以琼脂稀释法测定头孢三嗪的最小抑菌浓度(mic)。
